responsibilities: Work closely with direct partners and government agencies to understand their technical requirements and develop solutions to meet their needs
Design, build, and integrate end-to-end systems and launch-plan strategies
Use broad range of technical and soft skills to build productive relationships with partners and independently resolve complex technical and business needs
Deliver high-quality project/integration/partner engagements and influence product roadmap to meet business needs
Guide workflow changes and gain consensus from stakeholders while driving toward solutions
Respond and maintain effective communication with industry partners and internal stakeholders
Build and manage working relationships with technical counterparts
Participate in interviewing and onboarding of new team members
Willingness to travel up to 20% of the time
skills: Technical and soft skills for building productive relationships
Expertise and product insight for delivering high-quality engagements
Ability to independently resolve complex technical and business needs
Effective communication skills with industry partners and internal stakeholders
Ability to guide workflow changes and gain consensus from stakeholders
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, relevant technical field, or equivalent practical experience
